Name: ANIME REDEMPTION
About the game: ANIME REDEMPTION is an adventurous shooting game in the Wild West theme. You are playing for Wild West Girl: brave lonely H.E.N.T.A.I. fighter who is ready to take on all of the bad dudes out there. Your target is to kill as many enemies as you have the balls to.. Features: authentic Wild West atmosphere variety of weapons to choose from realistic Wild West fighting mechanics
